title: Closing the loop: A framework for tackling single-use plastic waste in the food and beverage industry through circular economy- a review
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 359

Author(s): Victoria Foluke Arijeniwa, Adenike A. Akinsemolu, Deborah C. Chukwugozie, Ulakom Genesis Onawo, Chidinma Ezinne Ochulor, Uju M. Nwauzoma, Dinah Awino Kawino, Helen Onyeaka
